etymologies: late 17th century (also denoting a mixture of spices): French, from Old French dragie (see dredge)

definitions: a candy consisting of a center covered with a coating, such as a sugared almond or a chocolate.
shortDefinitions: sweet consisting of centre covered with coating, such as sugared almond

definitions: a small silver ball for decorating cookies or a cake.
shortDefinitions: small silver ball for decorating cake
